attributes.additional_details:
In 2010 Theresa May confidently predicted that "We can cut police budget without risking violent unrest".

The recent events in London have shown Theresa Mays great misjudgment and must surely call into question her fitness to give the political leadership and defense of the police at this time of crisis.

Theresa May is not a fit and proper person to be Home Secretary. Theresa May should be relived of her office.
